content:
{
  "name": "pkg-entry-and-bin-resolved",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "`main` entry and `bin` paths resolved from package.json",
  "main": "index.es5.js",
  "jsnext:main": "index.js",
  "files": [
    "index.es5.js",
    "index.js"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "watch": "npm run transpile -- --watch",
    "coverage": "nyc -r=text -r=lcov npm test",
    "precoveralls": "npm run coverage",
    "coveralls": "coveralls < coverage/lcov.info",
    "test": "ava --require babel-register",
    "tdd": "npm test -- --watch",
    "transpile": "babel index.js --out-file index.es5.js",
    "prepublish": "npm run transpile",
    "clean": "rimraf index.es5.js",
    "push": "git push --follow-tags",
    "postpublish": "npm-run-all clean push"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/iamstarkov/pkg-entry-and-bin-resolved.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "pkg",
    "resolve",
    "package",
    "bin",
    "binaries",
    "entry",
    "main"
  ],
  "author": "Vladimir Starkov <iamstarkov@gmail.com> (https://iamstarkov.com)",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/iamstarkov/pkg-entry-and-bin-resolved/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/iamstarkov/pkg-entry-and-bin-resolved#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "ava": "^0.14.0",
    "babel-cli": "6.6.5",
    "babel-eslint": "^6.0.3",
    "babel-plugin-add-module-exports": "^0.2.0",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.6.0",
    "babel-register": "6.7.2",
    "chokidar": "^1.4.3",
    "coveralls": "^2.11.8",
    "eslint": "^2.4.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^3.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^1.7.0",
    "eslint-plugin-require-path-exists": "^1.1.5",
    "npm-run-all": "^1.5.1",
    "nyc": "^6.0.0",
    "rimraf": "^2.5.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "load-json-file": "1.1.0",
    "neat-contract": "^1.1.0",
    "pinkie-promise": "^2.0.1",
    "pkg-bin-paths": "^1.0.0",
    "pkg-entry": "^1.0.0",
    "ramda": "^0.21.0",
    "resolve-cwd": "^1.0.0"
  }
}
